name: Dungeon of Sarkov
description:
The basic structure of the game currently is to delve deep into a dungeon, escaping when in danger, trying a variety of builds and attempting to make it to the bottom.  Collect gold and items to help you make it through the dungeon. 

Note, if you do not know the controls, press "I" when loading up the game and it will display instructions, when done hit I again and it will remove the text.
